DARC Technician Level Hamcram

POC - Rial Sloan, AI4ZV

December 16, 2017

From 8:00a to 2:30p

Location: Whitfield E911 Center, 804 Professional Blvd, Dalton, GA 30720

Get your HAM radio license! Cram is free, test is $10. Bring your Driver’s License or FCC license for upgrades. Testing begins at 3pm.

Email Organizer

Dalton Amateur Radio Club

Seeking to advance the state of art and science of amateur radio communications through education, training, experimentation, and research. Promoting the free interchange of technical information among and between amateur radio operators and the general public. W4DRC
